title: cant open riot support, need support for support
body: trying to open "my tickets" tab and it fails to load and "submit request" brings me to an error logging in screen despite being logged in

replies.body: Do me a favor and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly. Sometimes your browser cache gets a little confused with our support site and causes that kind of problem. Let me know if it doesn't work, and you can always email support at support@riotgames.com if the ticket doesn't want to work.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VgPrO2v0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-25T02:32:31.156+0000)
>
> Do me a favor and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) really quickly. Sometimes your browser cache gets a little confused with our support site and causes that kind of problem. Let me know if it doesn't work, and you can always email support at support@riotgames.com if the ticket doesn't want to work.

not trying to view a current ticket im trying to view all the tickets i have ever submitted, also that didnt work, support site still has blackscreen errors and issues with the log in

Strange, the support site doesn't seem to be having any major issues impacting everyone. Try opening the support site in a private or incognito window/tab, or using a different browser entirely. Let me know if that works at all!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VgPrO2v0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-25T21:50:41.170+0000)
>
> Strange, the support site doesn't seem to be having any major issues impacting everyone. Try opening the support site in a private or incognito window/tab, or using a different browser entirely. Let me know if that works at all!

incog works regular chrome browser does not

Whelp, at least we got you in? Thanks for letting me know that worked for sure, this way I can try to suggest this "fix" to others if this happens. I'll poke some people to see if we can get eyes on this issue to try and get it working normally again!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VgPrO2v0,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-26T01:52:54.704+0000)

thanks, i hope they can figure out y normal google chrome is having issues but not incog window

It's likely something to do with some really weird caching issue. Computers are WEIRD yo

I'm just glad it works in some form xD
